channel.title: Just Getting This Out There
channel.description:
It can be done, it has been done. This was taken earlier this morning. I've spent the last 9 or 10 months working on this, there's lots of issues that need to be addressed, and this is only the second time I was able to get a script that logged in and completed at least one command smoothly—enough. Just getting this script alone to work took an all-nighter since I knew I was on the verge of some mild success.
[IMG]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/6196/rio.png[/img]

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

I understand people can be idiots, but we really know how to prevent people from learning LoL.

Read full topic

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:50, topic:331812”][quote author=pplsuqbawlz link=topic=428192.msg3152176#msg3152176 date=1268653386]
You can, lol! This bug has been around awhile, pity you, the community, only just find these. Here’s a freebie: You can use warps from a distance… By warps I mean stairs etc. You just need a certain few things activated on your character… Oh, and when you use the warp, it will telport you to your current x/y, 1 story above or below you… Sooo, you can essentially get inside the locked compartments in varrock bank; no joke. By being around a long time, I mean think back… A WIDELY abused bug was the dance-teleport… It’s essentially the same with new means.
[/quote]maybe you should move on from rsc and early rs2 :/[/quote]

And current rs2, and I have, yay for WoW

Read full topic

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“speedster239, post:39, topic:331812”][quote author=nacional link=topic=428192.msg3150119#msg3150119 date=1268456360]
That’s awesome if you guys remember in rsc, certain people would cheat in stakes with something like this,
if they knew they were gonna lose they would bank the items.
[/quote]

I considered this but like I said I’m not able to access the bank on anything other than ground level. I’m still looking at a way to work around this.[/quote]

You can, lol! This bug has been around awhile, pity you, the community, only just find these. Here’s a freebie: You can use warps from a distance… By warps I mean stairs etc. You just need a certain few things activated on your character… Oh, and when you use the warp, it will telport you to your current x/y, 1 story above or below you… Sooo, you can essentially get inside the locked compartments in varrock bank; no joke. By being around a long time, I mean think back… A WIDELY abused bug was the dance-teleport… It’s essentially the same with new means.

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @speedster239 speedster239
item.description:
@speedster239 wrote:

Super_, you’re right, everything I’m doing has been done before, none of it is special or makes me special and at the very bottom of it I am an idiot. However, I am experimenting with an alternative method to creating a bot and that’s why I’m documenting a little bit of what I’ve been doing.

That’s acceptable?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

wow coz i cant do this with any other style bot… everything you are doing could be achieved in a bcel/reflection/deob (whatever other method) style bot. This method has been discussed time after time and it simply is not plausable.

Also by the way you’ve been talking and the lack of code you’ve shown im quite inclined to think this could even be some retarded troll / fake. Anyway what do I care…

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:

[quote=“speedster239, post:39, topic:331812”][quote author=nacional link=topic=428192.msg3150119#msg3150119 date=1268456360]
That’s awesome if you guys remember in rsc, certain people would cheat in stakes with something like this,
if they knew they were gonna lose they would bank the items.
[/quote]

I considered this but like I said I’m not able to access the bank on anything other than ground level. I’m still looking at a way to work around this.[/quote]

not sure what you mean by ground level.
what about, it could save time when you buy stuff(nonstackable)
at a shop.

Read full topic

It’s designated differently, along with other minigames like Castle Wars.[/quote]

but if you can see a fight from ground level doesn’t that mean that the fight itself is at ground level?

item.title: Just Getting This Out There
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“speedster239, post:30, topic:331812”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=428192.msg3149279#msg3149279 date=1268382051]

Won’t be the first time it happened, Speljohan. It’s only proof of concept right now. I’ll work on not getting banned once I get banned.
[/quote]Not like you can prevent getting banned from it. It is a valid assumption that they check your location server-side to prevent things like these from happening.

I’m sure they do.

But, if there was some way to maintain with the server that you’re still in the bank, well that would do the trick.[/quote]Except when you move it will send packets which are completely off from what it expects so you would get detected anyway.

Read full topic
